chapter:
Csbeats
Csbeats Csbeats is an alternative score language that is aimed at specifying simple scores in standard western tunings and rhythms. Csbeats can be invoked via the CsScore component of a standard .csd score with bin="csbeats" or as stand-alone program which generates a standard numeric score.
As a stand-alone the program reads standard input and writes to standard output.
